body:
School conjuration (creation)

Level cleric 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1

Duration 1 minute/level (D)

Saving Throw none

Spell Resistance no

Target Restrictions barrier, burst (emanation)

This effect word creates a thick fog in its area of effect. It obscures all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet. Creatures 5 feet away have concealment, whereas creatures farther away have total concealment. A moderate wind or fire effect removes the fog in the affected area. The fog is stationary.
name: Fog Bank
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Weather Words/Fog Bank

sections.body: If a wordspell with this effect word uses the burst target word, it can be directed to move up to 10 feet each round by the caster as a swift action.
